meanings.definition: missionizers: those who engage in missionary work
meanings.sent1: The missionizers traveled to remote villages to spread their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The group of missionizers set up a clinic to help the community.
meanings.sent3: The missionizers organized a bake sale to raise funds for their mission.
meanings.sent4: The missionizers were like messengers of hope in the far-off lands.
meanings.sent5: The missionizers wore bright uniforms to stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: missionizers: to convert or attempt to convert others to a particular belief or religion
meanings.sent1: She missionizers her friends by sharing her faith with them.
meanings.sent2: The preacher missionizers the congregation every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: He missionizers his classmates by inviting them to church events.
meanings.sent4: The team missionizers the community through acts of kindness.
meanings.sent5: They missionizers tirelessly, hoping to make a positive impact.

meanings.definition: missionizers: the act of spreading a particular belief or religion to others
meanings.sent1: The missionizers' mission was to spread love and compassion.
meanings.sent2: The missionizers' work led to a greater understanding among different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The missionizers' enthusiasm for their cause was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The missionizers' dedication knew no bounds in their outreach efforts.
meanings.sent5: The missionizers' message resonated with people from all walks of life.
